education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

questions.question: Tell me about your experience with React Native.
questions.answer: I've been working with React Native for 2 years, building cross-platform mobile applications. I've implemented complex UI components, integrated with RESTful APIs, and used state management libraries like Redux.
questions.feedback: Good answer, shows specific experience and technical knowledge.

questions.question: How do you handle state management in large React applications?
questions.answer: For large applications, I prefer using Redux for global state management. For component-specific state, I use React's useState and useReducer hooks. I also implement context API for sharing state between related components without prop drilling.
questions.feedback: Excellent answer with multiple approaches based on different scenarios.

int-001.notes: Went well overall. Follow up on their tech stack and team structure.
int-001.overall_feedback: Strong technical skills, good communication. Prepare more examples of problem-solving for next round.

saved_jobs.description: We are looking for a Senior React Developer to join our growing team. You will be responsible for building and maintaining high-performance web applications using React and related technologies.
saved_jobs.education_required: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
saved_jobs.requirements: Strong experience with React and modern JavaScript. Knowledge of state management patterns and libraries.
saved_jobs.notes: Sent application with portfolio link. Follow up next week if no response.

saved_jobs.description: Digital Creations is seeking a Full Stack Developer to work on our e-commerce platform. You will be involved in both frontend and backend development using React and Node.js.
saved_jobs.requirements: Experience with full stack JavaScript development. Knowledge of e-commerce platforms is a plus.
saved_jobs.notes: First interview scheduled for July 5th at 2 PM. Prepare examples of e-commerce projects.

saved_jobs.description: Join our team of AI experts to develop cutting-edge machine learning solutions for various industries. You will design, implement, and optimize ML models for real-world applications.
saved_jobs.education_required: Master's degree in Computer Science, AI, or related field preferred
saved_jobs.requirements: Strong understanding of machine learning algorithms and frameworks. Experience with deploying ML models in production environments.
saved_jobs.notes: Interesting opportunity but requires more ML experience. Consider applying after completing the current ML course.

saved_jobs.description: MobileFirst Apps is looking for a React Native developer to help build cross-platform mobile applications for our clients in various industries.
saved_jobs.requirements: Experience building and deploying React Native applications. Knowledge of iOS and Android development processes.
saved_jobs.notes: Applied with GitHub portfolio. Position seems like a great fit for my React Native experience.

saved_jobs.description: WebSolutions is seeking a Frontend Developer to join our remote team. You will be responsible for implementing responsive user interfaces and collaborating with designers and backend developers.
saved_jobs.requirements: Strong frontend development skills with React. Experience with modern CSS frameworks and responsive design principles.
saved_jobs.notes: Received rejection email. They were looking for someone with more experience in their specific industry (finance).
